The '''pet slime''' is a pet variant of the [[slime]] introduced in [[25w14craftmine]].

== Spawning ==
A pet slime spawns next to the player on [[Mine (dimension)|mine]] start when the "Pet Slime" [[Player Unlock]] is active.

== Drops ==
Pet slime drops nothing when it's killed.

== Behavior ==
The pet slime is similar to the regular [[slime]], but there are still some differences:
*The [[player]]'s [[melee attack]] can't damage the pet slime.
*The [[frog]] doesn't attack the pet slime.
*The pet slime doesn't chase the player.
